Curriculum Vitae  
John Pennington   
 
 
DOB:    16th August 1966                                                                    Roman House  
Status:   Married                                                                                  St Andrew’s Meadow  
Mobile: 0 7864636318                                                                          Lyme Regis  
Email:   johnfdp2011@yahoo.co.uk                                                    Dorset DT7 3NS  
 
John is a  highly experienced IT professional with over 30 years work experience .   
Starting his career as a Systems Engineer and Trainer, f or the last 2 5 years John has 
worked in Sales, Sales Management  and Sales Specialist roles .  He  has extensive channel 
& vendor experience  and is used dealing with C suite and senior stakeholders in high 
value projects . 
  
Education:  
 
-1988 London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE)  
  M.Sc. Analysis, Design and Management of Information Systems  
-1987 University of East London  
  Graduate Diploma in Computer Studies with BCS Part II  
-1986 University of East London  
  HND Computer Studies with BCS Part I  
 
 
Career History:  
 
Jun 19- 
IBM   Security Sales Specialist  
Aligned to named Strategic accounts , John is specialisin g in IBM’s Threat Management 
product portfolio .   
 
Apr 15-May 19 
Cisco                  Cyber Security Sales Specialist   
This role is to provide specialist security sales , strategy  and service  expertise  to BT, Sky, 
LGI, EE, Hutch/3G and Inmarsat.  John work ed together with a security architect and 
they were  goaled on security product and service sales.  In his first full quarter John 
achieved 120% of his target  ($457k) .  In financial year 2016 he achieved 10 8% of his 
target  ($9.5M) , 123% in 2017  ($12.1M) and 100% in 2018  ($12.8M).   In Q1 of 2018 
John was awarded ‘Global Security Specialist of the Quarter ’ and he has twice won 
presentation competitions within EMEA . 
 
 
 
 
 
Aug 13 -Mar 15  
Juniper Networks                   Security Sales Manager  UKI 
Responsible for managing security sales and service in the UK  and reporting to the UK 
sales director , this role was very diverse.  From for ecasting to deal assistance, customer 
facing meetings, press work, security strategy and blogging, John was responsible for and 
paid on Junipers  UK security results.  A great deal of time was spent developing and 
working with Juniper’s channel partners.  Over achiever ’s club reached in his first full 
quarter and hit 104% of his FY14 target of $32 million despite a very challenging year 
due to Juniper selling and dropping several security products .  In 2015 Juniper had a 
global re -structure that lead to the redundancy of this role.  
 
Mar 12 -Mar 13 
Mimecast                     Enterprise Account Director  
Mimecast predominantly sell in the SM E space and John was hired to help develop  new 
business to organisations  with over 2500 users .  During his time at Mimecast John closed 
three new deals and developed a significant pipeline of enterprise business.  
 
Sep 10-Oct 11 
Proofpoint                    Regional Sales Manager  
John’s role at Proofpoint was to grow the UK customer base and develop the channel.  
He closed several net new deals within the UK public & private sectors and engaged with 
several security partners who develop ed a strong pipeline  for the UK business .   
 
Oct 06-May 09 
IronPort Systems/Cisco                 UK Territory Manager  
Recruited to joi n a small direct sales team selling throughout the UK, John immediately 
got up to speed and achieved 185% of small target given at the end of 2 006.  In 2007 he 
exited on 140% of target and achieved 217% in 2008.   In 2008 John was the first sales 
person in Northern Europe to achieve goal, the highest overall revenue earner and closed 
more new customers than the rest of the UK team combined.  Duri ng 2009 IronPort was 
integrated into Cisco Systems and Johns role became primarily overlay sales to the Cisco 
major account team.  
 
Aug 05 -Sep 06  
EMC Corporation                 Senior Sales Executive  
Working for the EMC Software Group John was responsible f or assisting the direct sales 
team and the channel  in selling EMC email archiving, disk archiving and backup 
software .  John achieved 150% of Q4 2005 target and left after the third quarter of 2006, 
at which point he was at 89% of his annual target.   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Sep 94 -Aug 05  
Productivity Computer Solution Ltd                 Southern Sales Manager  
This was John’s first sales position  and he was given a new business role in the City.  He 
quickly established a loyal base of new customers  across finance, geoscienc e, legal and 
manufacturing sectors .  After 2 years in the role (both of which he was top sales 
performer  in the company ) John was asked to build a  new team of Southern based sales 
staff and grew the team to 1 4 in 5 years with a turnover of 25 million pound s.  John’s 
team generated significant new business for Sun Microsystems and won PCS ‘New 
Business Reseller of the Year’ in 2000.   
 
 
Jan 93-Sep 94 
Sun Microsystems                 Senior Systems Engineer  
Working with the City sales team John was responsible  for helping to close new business 
with existing and customers and prospects.  The majority of his work was with Sun ’s new 
server hardware and he was a specialist in Suns disk partitioning software, ‘Disksuite’.  
John also assisted with reseller training c ourses throughout the UK.   It was during this 
role that John decided to move into sales.   
 
Sep 88 -Dec 92                 
Siemens Data Systems/Siemens Nixdorf                Systems Engineer/UNIX Trainer  
John was hired along with three others for a graduate  training scheme.  Initially based in 
Munich for the first nine months learning German and at tending UNIX courses (in 
German ), John worked in an International Sales and Marketing dept helping to write 
tender responses  on public sector bids and also was inv olved in install work.  When 
Siemens took over Nixdorf , John moved to the training dept where for two years he was 
full time UNIX trainer and course author.  He delivered UNIX courses for Siemens 
Nixdorf staff, resellers and customers throughout the world.  
 
 
Other:  
 
Trustee of   local primary school  
Chairman and director of property management company  
Member of British Computer Society and Chartered IT Professional   
 
 
Interests:  
 
Road cycling and  unwinding in Provence
